Title: Relates to payment of moneys due for prior years
Summary: Relates to payment of moneys due for prior years; provides that if a school district is owed funds on the prior year adjustment list maintained by the department, prior to deducting any money, the department shall first offset the overpayment amount by the total amount owed on such list regardless of the district's priority date status.
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the education law, in relation to payment of moneys due for prior years
